fullText: Frank Langella gives a master class in acting as Andre, an aging man whose grip on reality is slipping away in Florian Zeller's devastating drama about dementia.
dtliExcerpt: Frank Langella gives a master class in acting as Andre, an aging man whose grip on reality is slipping away in Florian Zeller's devastating drama about dementia.
